body_html:
Thanks @snnn,

I've already figured out where to get msvcp140.dll
But I believe the problem should be solved in a generic way. So that other users like me don't have to face it in the future.
At the very least "MS Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable" dependency should be clearly mentioned in the System Requirements as well as Installation documentation.

body:
Thanks @snnn,

I've already figured out where to get msvcp140.dll
But I believe the problem should be solved in a generic way. So that other users like me don't have to face it in the future.
At the very least "MS Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable" dependency should be clearly mentioned in the System Requirements as well as Installation documentation.
